en_title: LC: Secretary for Justice's speech to move third reading of Arbitration (Amendment) Bill 2015
zh_title: 立法會︰律政司司長動議三讀《2015年仲裁（修訂）條例草案》發言全文

en: Following is the translation of a speech by the Secretary for Justice, Mr Rimsky Yuen, SC, to move the third reading of the Arbitration (Amendment) Bill 2015 at the Legislative Council today (July 9):
The Arbitration (Amendment) Bill 2015 has passed through the Committee Stage with an amendment. I move that this Bill be read the third time and do pass.
zh: 以下是律政司司長袁國強資深大律師今日（七月九日）在立法會會議上動議三讀《2015年仲裁（修訂）條例草案》的發言全文︰
《2015年仲裁（修訂）條例草案》經修正後已通過全體委員會審議階段。我動議此條例草案予以三讀並通過。

en: Following is the translation of a speech by the Secretary for Justice, Mr Rimsky Yuen, SC, to move the third reading of the Arbitration (Amendment) Bill 2015 at the Legislative Council today (July 9):
The Arbitration (Amendment) Bill 2015 has passed through the Committee Stage with an amendment
I move that this Bill be read the third time and do pass.
zh: 以下是律政司司長袁國強資深大律師今日（七月九日）在立法會會議上動議三讀《2015年仲裁（修訂）條例草案》的發言全文︰
《2015年仲裁（修訂）條例草案》經修正後已通過全體委員會審議階段
我動議此條例草案予以三讀並通過
